## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [col](./hdom-components.sparklineopts.col.md) | <code>string</code> | Sparkline CSS color Default: red |
|  [height](./hdom-components.sparklineopts.height.md) | <code>number</code> | Sparkline height Default: 16 |
